title: Big Bar Reaction Ferry
description: Big Bar Reaction Ferry. Travel advisory in effect at Big Bar Reaction Ferry (Big Bar Reaction Ferry). Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only. Next update time Fri May 30, 2025. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 9:13 AM PST. (DBC-70341)
Description: Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only.

title: Highway 1
description:
Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway). Bridge maintenance between Mt Sicker Rd and Fuller Lake Rd for 3.7 km (Chemainus). Until Fri Feb 28 at 2:00 AM PST. Lane Closure. Reduced speed zone. NB Bridge closed for repairs.
Overwidth protocols Commercial loads 3.2m-3.8m required to pull over and contact for access over SB bridge. Overwidth access only 6-12AM. Loads over 3.8m need 5day notice to accommodate. Next update time Fri Feb 28 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Thu Jan 16 at 2:13 PM PST. (DBC-70685)

title: Highway 1 Eastbound
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), eastbound. Road cleared at Port Mann Bridge (Surrey). Last updated Fri Jan 31 at 4:06 PM PST. (DBC-72466)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), eastbound at Port Mann Bridge (Surrey)

title: Highway 1 Eastbound
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), eastbound. Police incident between Exit 55: 192 St and Exit 58: 200 St (Langley - District). Right lane of exit ramp closed. Expect delays. Next update time Fri Jan 31 at 4:30 PM PST. Last updated Fri Jan 31 at 2:33 PM PST. (DBC-72392)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), eastbound, between Exit 55: 192 St and Exit 58: 200 St (Langley - District)
Description: Police incident. Right lane of exit ramp closed. Expect delays.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. 60km/h limit through work zone. Intermittent delays of up to 5 minutes. Four stoppages of up to 20 minutes between 9 AM and 3 PM. Watch for traffic control. Next update time Tue Apr 1 at 5:00 PM PST. Last updated Thu Jan 23 at 10:11 AM PST. (DBC-64961)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Ford Rd and Schneider Pl for 4.5 km (Tappen). Until Sat Oct 31, 2026. From 7:00 AM to 4:00 AM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Expect up to 30 min delays. Reduced speed through work zone to 60 km/hr. Intermittent minor stoppages and single lane alternating traffic. Watch for traffic control. Next update time Thu Feb 27 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Jan 27 at 12:01 PM PST. (DBC-72306)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Ford Rd and Schneider Pl (Tappen), BC, Canada
Description: Construction work. Expect up to 30 min delays. Reduced speed through work zone to 60 km/hr. Intermittent minor stoppages and single lane alternating traffic. Watch for traffic control.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Blasting between Tappen Beach Rd and 65 Ave NW for 2.6 km (Salmon Arm to 2 km east of Tappen). Until Wed Dec 31. From 7:00 AM to 4:00 AM PST on weekdays and Saturday. 20 minute closure at 1 PM and 30 minute closure at 7 PM daily. Intermittent 5 minute closures and single lane alternating traffic may be required between 7 AM and 4 AM. Next update time Thu Feb 27 at 5:00 PM PST. Last updated Mon Jan 27 at 12:01 PM PST. (DBC-72305)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Tappen Beach Rd and 65 Ave NW for 2.6 km (Salmon Arm to 2 km east of Tappen)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous). From 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Bridge is closed. Use alternate route. NO CLOSURE ON JANUARY 31st. Single lane alternating traffic nightly 8pm to 6am January 27 to February 1. Next update time Sat Feb 1 at 5:00 PM PST. Last updated Fri Jan 31 at 6:44 AM PST. (DBC-70490)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Weather advisory in effect between Silver Sands Rd and BC/Alberta Border for 289.4 km (Sicamous to 16 km east of Field). Until Sat Feb 1 at 11:45 PM PST. Changing avalanche conditions. Travelers can expect rapidly deteriorating conditions and visibility. Prepare for short notice closures for avalanche control work. Consider alternate travel plans. Next update time Sat Feb 1 at 11:30 PM PST. Last updated Fri Jan 31 at 12:16 AM PST. (DBC-72397)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions between Silver Sands Rd and BC/Alberta Border for 289.4 km (Sicamous to 16 km east of Field)
Description: Weather advisory in effect. Changing avalanche conditions. Travelers can expect rapidly deteriorating conditions and visibility. Prepare for short notice closures for avalanche control work. Consider alternate travel plans.

title: Highway 1
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway). Avalanche control work between Griffin Lake Avalanche Gate and Clanwilliam OH Bridge for 15.4 km (9 to 24 km west of Revelstoke). Until Fri Jan 31 at 5:30 PM PST. Road closed. Watch for traffic control. Next update time Fri Jan 31 at 5:30 PM PST. Last updated Fri Jan 31 at 2:07 PM PST. (DBC-72456)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway) between Griffin Lake Avalanche Gate and Clanwilliam OH Bridge for 15.4 km (9 to 24 km west of Revelstoke)
Description: Avalanche control work. Road closed. Watch for traffic control.

title: Highway 1
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway). Avalanche control work planned between Townley St and 14th St N for 142.5 km (Revelstoke to Golden). Starting Fri Jan 31 at 9:00 PM PST. Road closure planned. Watch for traffic control personnel. Traffic Control will be holding Commercial Vehicles in Malakwa for less congestion on Highway 1. Passenger vehicles can bypass the Malakwa traffic hold. Next update time Sat Feb 1 at 3:45 AM PST. Last updated Fri Jan 31 at 2:57 PM PST. (DBC-72426)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway) between Townley St and 14th St N for 142.5 km (Revelstoke to Golden)
Description: Avalanche control work planned. Road closure planned. Watch for traffic control personnel. Traffic Control will be holding Commercial Vehicles in Malakwa for less congestion on Highway 1. Passenger vehicles can bypass the Malakwa traffic hold.

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)

title: Highway 17 Westbound
description: Highway 17, westbound. Night time construction work between Bridgeview Dr and Tannery Rd for 3.3 km (Surrey). Until Sat Feb 1. From 9:00 PM to 5:00 AM PST daily. Road closed. Detour via Bridgeview Drive to Scott Road to Tannery Road. Next update time Sat Feb 1 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Thu Jan 30 at 11:07 PM PST. (DBC-72259)

title: Highway 27 Both Directions
description: Highway 27, in both directions. Road cleared between Snell Rd E and Braeside Rd for 1.6 km (48 to 46 km south of Fort St James). Last updated Fri Jan 31 at 4:17 PM PST. (DBC-72449)
Location: Highway 27, in both directions between Snell Rd E and Braeside Rd for 1.6 km (48 to 46 km south of Fort St James)

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Mon-Fri essential service Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Sat-Sun Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 9:40PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 10:20PM. Essential service travelers board 1st, then general public. Emergency services accommodated. Next update time Tue Feb 4 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Jan 31 at 8:33 AM PST. (DBC-69872)
Location: Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions
Description: Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)
